mongodb.dbEmpty: Database Empty. Add items to populate the database
mongodb.dbItemExists: Data with same key/attribute/value Already Exists
mongodb.dbItemNotFound: Database Item Not Found. Try again

error.internalError: Internal Server Error. Please try again later
error.noTitle: No Name/Title Found. Please try again with appropriate name/title
error.enterAllNeccessarry: Please fill in all the neccessary details

authError.unauthenticated: No Authentication Token Found. Access Denied
authError.userAlreadyExists: User Account already exists with the same E-Mail/Phone Number
authError.noUser: No User Found with entered credentials
